fields.title: Harris 1980 Chemical Bank Monitor No. 3 Survey, study no. 805577

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This study focuses on the mood of executives of New York's medium- sized businesses including two particular aspects of their activities: their experiences with the recession and their cash management practices

keyword.keywordValue: Effect of recession on business outlook

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Harris telephone surveys use a form of random digit dialing. From a random multi-stage cluster sampling design, they obtain a national cross-section of U.S. adults. Interviewers are usually given the first five digits of a series of randomly selected residential telephone numbers that have previously been stratified by geographic locations, including minor civil divisions. The interviewer then adds two randomly generated digits to complete a new seven-digit number; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-8055-07;
